attributes.action: Have more 'Proms in the Park' events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year I could not attend such an event as I already had toomuch school work. There are currently only five 'Proms in thePark' events throughout the UK. However there are many 'blindspots'. I think that if events were organised in places forexample Edinburgh or Newcastle then many more people couldattend. Thankyou

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
